wikipedia_page.main: Robert Charles Hosker (born 27 February 1955) is an English former professional footballer who played as a winger in the Football League for York City, in non-League football for Boston United and was on the books of Middlesbrough without making a league appearance. After Boston he go to Belgium and play by Racing Jet de Bruxelles in Division one (68/3), Division two and three, and stop after fusion in 1988.

response: * Bobby Hosker (born 1955 in Cannock) former professional footballer, over 300 pro appearances
